scbm_async_t Struct Reference

This structure defines the asynchronous I/O descriptor type.

Data Fields

  • signed long forget
  • SCBM_CALLBACKROUTINE_T * callback_routine
  • void * callback_context

Field Documentation

signed long scbm_async_t::forget

Set to TRUE if the application does not want to retrieve the result of the operation, FALSE otherwise.

SCBM_CALLBACKROUTINE_T* scbm_async_t::callback_routine

Pointer to SCBM callback routine.

void* scbm_async_t::callback_context

Pointer to private context for callback routine.
